column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Today is my friend 's birthday so I decided I wanted to bake a cake for her .
#text=First , I went to the grocery store and bought all the ingredients I would need to make the cake like flour , eggs , oil , sugar and butter .
#text=I also bought some candles to put on top of the cake once it was done .
#text=Then I went home and headed for the kitchen .
#text=I preheated the oven so it would be hot and ready for the cake and then got out my bowls and measuring cups and spoons .
#text=I mixed all the ingredients in a bowl then got out a cake pan and greased it with butter so the cake would not stick , poured the cake batter in the pan and put the pan in the oven to bake .
#text=I set the timer on the oven so it would beep when the cake was done , then cleaned up the bowls and spoons I had used .
#text=When the cake was done I took it out of the oven and let it cool then decorated it with frosting and candles .
#text=When I saw my friend later that day , I lit the candles and sang Happy Birthday to her .
